name: security_result
description: Security related metadata for the event. Describes the outcome of a security analysis.

children.name: about
children.description: If the security result is about a specific entity (Noun), add it here.

children.name: action_details
children.description: The detail of the action taken as provided by the vendor.

children.name: alert_state
children.description: The alerting types of this security result.

children.name: confidence
children.description: The confidence level of the result as estimated by the product.

children.name: confidence_details
children.description: Additional detail with regards to the confidence of a security event.

children.name: confidence_score
children.description: The confidence score of the security result.

children.name: description
children.description: A human readable description (e.g. 'user password was wrong').

children.name: detection_fields
children.description: An ordered list of values that represent fields in detections for a security finding (repeated).

children.name: first_discovered_time
children.description: First time the IoC threat was discovered in the provider.

children.name: last_discovered_time
children.description: Last time the IoC was seen in the provider data.

children.name: last_updated_time
children.description: Last time the IoC threat was updated in the provider.

children.name: priority_details
children.description: Vendor-specific information about the security result priority.

children.name: risk_score
children.description: The risk score of the security result.

children.name: rule_id
children.description: A vendor-specific ID for a rule.

children.name: summary
children.description: A human readable summary (e.g. 'failed login occurred').

children.name: threat_id_namespace
children.description: The namespace for the threat_id to ensure uniqueness.

children.name: threat_name
children.description: A vendor-assigned classification common across multiple customers.

children.name: url_back_to_product
children.description: URL that takes the user to the source product console for this event.

children.name: verdict
children.description: Verdict about the IoC from the provider. (Deprecated)
